name: (Ready Stock)Espresso Coffee Machine Cleaning Urnex Cafiza2 Cleaning Powder (900g)
description:
All goods are ready stock to ship

--- KEY FEATURES ---

Eliminates coffee residue and oils from espresso machine groupheads, valves and lines.

Keeps screens and filters clear for even extraction.

Can also be used to make a soaking solution to clean portafilters, baskets, screens, and other parts.

Formulated for optimal balance of solubility and foaming.

Machine Cleaning Powder is integral to the daily backflush regimen and is recommended for use with a wide range of traditional espresso machines.

Odorless.

Condition : 100% new
Qty : 1 bottle cleaning powder 

Instruction for use :

Backflush (each group head):
Insert blind filter in portafilter and add up to 1/2 teaspoon (3g) of Cafiza¬Æ Powder. 
Insert portafilter into group headActivate brew cycle for 10 seconds. 
Stop for 10 seconds. Repeat 5 times. Remove portafilter. 
Activate brew cycle and rinse portafilter in a stream of water from group head. Stop cycleInsert portafilter into group head. Activate brew cycle for 10 seconds. Stop for 10 seconds. Repeat 5 times
Make and discard a cup of espresso to ensure no residue remains

 
Soak:
Soak filters and the metal parts of the portafilter for 30 minutes in 1 teaspoon (6g) of Cafiza¬Æ Powder per 1L of hot water. Rinse with clean hot water

 
For Use on Coffee Brewers
Empty coffee from equipment. Sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon (3g) of Cafiza¬Æ powder per 2L of brewer capacity directly into brew basket
Run a full brew cycle into each vessel and hold for 30 minutes
Empty each vessel and rinse all parts with clean hot water

 
TIP: Wet a cloth with the Cafiza¬Æ Powder solution and wipe down spray heads, then wipe clean with a fresh cloth. Caution: Solution may be very hot.

description:
WDT, or the Weiss Distribution Technique, can help compensate for those shortcomings by evenly distributing coffee in the portafilter to promote more even extractions and better espresso. 

HOW TO USE:

Deep WDT Technique: WDT tool is inserted at full depth and used to stir the coffee grounds more vigorously in circular patterns, slowly going up and then finishing on the surface.

‚ÄúWhen I use the surface WDT method, my shots show significant variations in peak resistance, by about 40%. This means that using surface WDT will cause wide variations in flow rate when using the adaptive profiles. As a consequence, I will keep using the ‚Äúdeep WDT‚Äù method for now‚Äù. - Jonathan Gagn√© (Author The Physics of Paper Filter)

METHODOLOGIES USED BASE ON:

SWORKSDESIGN Method - 0.20mm and 0.25mm needles are used together. This way WDT have stiffer needles to more effectively stir and rake the coffee grounds while the thinner needles continue to fluff. This small diameter difference may seem insignificant but 0.25mm is actually 70% stiffer than 0.20mm.

This technique used by James Hoffmann. 

JKIM Method - Every kit comes with a set of nine 0.35mm needles that make breaking apart clumps and distributing coffee grounds a breeze. 

SWORKSDESIGN X JKIM Method - 0.35mm and 0.30mm needles are used together. This way WDT have stiffer needles to more effectively stir and rake the coffee grounds while the thinner needles continue to fluff.

PUCK RAKE

A puck rake is a ICM & Decent invention made for leveling the top of a un-tamped bed of grounds in a portafilter. This was designed for 0.35mm needles.

WDT REPLACEMENT NEEDLES

We are now offering replacement needles for your WDT Distribution Tool.

ADD-ON
Please add storage tube for extra protection to your WDT Tool

**PLEASE NOTE: 

- This WDT is handmade DIY project meant to be affordable and accessible for espresso enthusiasts.
- Our products are handcrafted by humans and are not machine made, please be aware there may be small imperfections.
- If you would like more of an angle it is easy to bend the needles slightly away from the centre. You can then fine tune to your preference.
- The product is equipped with stickers that have different colours and are sent randomly due to limited stock.

Please visit IG mengopidirumah for more info.

Edits:

12/5/22: Install 3M stickers so that they are stronger and more comfortable to hold. Reflective stickers are also installed for easy searching.

description:

BLIND FILTER DISK RUBBER SUITABLE FOR 51mm - 58mm PORTAFILTER

CARE INSTRUCTION: STORE AT COOL & DRY PLACE

Suitable for all types of manual and semi auto espresso machine

***** Please take note that these tablets are not coated type of tablets thus they will not be perfect in shape. *****

Eliminates residue in espresso machine group heads, valves, and lines.
Tablet format allows for easy and controlled dosing into a superautomatic espresso machine‚Äôs delivery chamber or a traditional espresso machine‚Äôs group head.
Organically listed by the Organic Materials Review Institute and NSF-Certified for use on espresso machines.
Each tablet is 12.0 mm in diameter and weighs 1.2 g.

***PLEASE FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS OF YOUR ESPRESSO MACHINE OR follow below for standard backflushing instructions***

For Use on Traditional Espresso Machines

1. Insert blind filter in portafilter and add 1 Cafiza tablet. Insert portafilter into group head.

2. Activate brew cycle for 10 seconds. Stop 10 seconds. Repeat 5 times.

3. Remove portafilter and rinse portafilter in stream of water from group head.

4. Re-insert portafilter without cleaner into group head. Activate brew cycle for 10 seconds. Stop 10 seconds. Repeat 5 times.

5. Make and discard a cup of espresso to ensure no residue remains.
